Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2009 04:27PM Cather1ne wrote: Since finishing chemotherapy and radiotherapy, and starting on tamoxifen I have developed eczema, as have a number of other women I know.   My doctors say it is not related, and is down to stress, even though I can point out to being less stressed now than previously.   I firmly believe that it is down in some way to the treatments I am on.   Don't you just hate it all :(
Posts.Title: Itchy skin of one breast?? 41jq Adi22
